summary: Utility module offering low-level operations for MRI reconstruction networks, including complex-valued normalization, divisible padding, batch-channel reshaping, sensitivity map manipulation, and centered FFT/iFFT wrappers built on PyTorch.
business_intent: Enable rapid development and reliable deployment of deep learning-based MRI reconstruction pipelines by providing reusable, performance-optimized building blocks for handling complex data and coil sensitivities.
